title: A Level Sociology - Interviews
description: Liz looks at interviews for your A Level Sociology exam. In this episode, she will look at structured/formal and unstructured/informal interviews. Ideal for preparing for your A Level Sociology exam. For more info visit www.senecalearning.com
dc:creator: Seneca Learning Revision
